Author: SpheneDev
Name: Sphene
Description: Through the power of Living Memory, this plugin harmonizes your Penumbra modifications and Glamourer configurations across all connected souls, ensuring endless synchronization in your shared digital realm.
Punchline: Become Endless. Return to Living Memory.
Changelog:
**Changes & Enhancements:**

 * Public City Syncshells now feature distinct names such as *Gridania Raiden* and *Limsa Phantom* for better identification.
 * You can now permanently leave an area or public Syncshell after joining it.
 * The UI now displays a toast notification when area Syncshells are available in your location. If auto-consent is enabled, a consent pop-up will appear immediately.
 * Added a new toggle in the settings and consent UI to control automatic consent pop-ups.
 * Improved detection and notification logic for area Syncshells.
 * A new button appears next to the Incognito button to open the area Syncshell selection. This button is only visible when area Syncshells are available.
